author: Unknown
quote: This Is The Year I Will Be Stronger, Braver, Kinder, Unstoppable, And This Year I Will Be Fierce.

author: Jane Hamilton
quote: In the larger world, tribalism is an enormous problem, as it ever has been, both strength and idiocy borne from belonging.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.

author: Unknown
quote: Fall Seven Times, Stand Up Eight.

author: Jack Welch
quote: Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while.

author: Unknown
quote: One Of The Most Courageous Decisions You’ll Ever Make Is To Finally Let Go Of What Is Hurting Your Heart And Soul.

author: Les Brown
quote: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: I think a hero is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.

author: Unknown
quote: Being Deeply Loved Gives You Strength; Loving Deeply Gives You Courage.

author: Atticus
quote: She was powerful, not because she wasn’t scared but because she went on so strongly, despite the fear.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.

author: Alexis Carrel
quote: Religion brings to man an inner strength, spiritual light, and ineffable peace.

author: Unknown
quote: If I Ever Let My Head Down It Will Be Just To Admire My Shoes.

author: Stephen Covey
quote: Strength lies in differences, not in similarities.

author: Ara Parseghian
quote: When I make a fist, it's strong, and you can't tear it apart. As long as there's unity, there's strength.

author: Unknown
quote: A Strong Woman Knows How To Keep Her Life In Line. With Tears In Her Eyes, She Still Manages To Say, “Nah, I’m Fine.”

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

author: Jim Morrison
quote: You feel your strength in the experience of pain.

author: Sabaa Tahir
quote: Life is made of so many moments that mean nothing. Then one day, a single moment comes along to define every second that comes after. Such moments are tests of courage, of strength.

author: Arthur Ashe
quote: I have always drawn strength from being close to home.

author: Unknown
quote: Her soul is fierce her heart is breave her mind is strong.

author: Unknown
quote: I Don’t Want You To Save Me. I Want You To Stand By My Side As I Save Myself.

author: Benjamin Netanyahu
quote: Peace is purchased from strength. It's not purchased from weakness or unilateral retreats.

author: Thomas Huxley
quote: Freedom and order are not incompatible... truth is strength... free discussion is the very life of truth.

author: Jon Krakauer
quote: It's not always necessary to be strong, but to feel strong.

author: Unknown
quote: May My Heart Be Brave, My Mind Fierce, And My Spirit Free.

author: Vladimir Putin
quote: The transfer of power is always a test of the constitutional system, a test of its strength.

author: Kiera Cass
quote: We know you’re strong, but accepting help is its own kind of strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Never Be Ashamed Of A Scar. It Simply Means You Were Stronger Than Whatever Tried To Hurt You.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: Be that strong girl that everyone knew would make it through the worst, be that fearless girl, the one who would dare to do anything, be that independent girl who didn't need a man; be that girl who never backed down.

author: Walter Annenberg
quote: God grant you the strength to fight off the temptations of surrender.

author: Sarah Dessen
quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that’s what makes you strong.

author: Unknown
quote: I Am Not What Happened To Me. I Am What I Choose To Become.

author: Samuel Johnson
quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
quote: The spirit of man is more important than mere physical strength, and the spiritual fiber of a nation than its wealth.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong.

author: Unknown
quote: When You Face Difficult Times, Know That Challenges Are Not Sent To Destroy You. They’re Sent To Promote, Increase And Strengthen You.

author: Eric Hoffer
quote: Rudeness is a weak imitation of strength.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.

author: Pythagoras
quote: Strength of mind rests in sobriety; for this keeps your reason unclouded by passion.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing takes more courage than putting yourself back together again.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Unless India stands up to the world, no one will respect us. In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.

author: Nikki Bella
quote: Believing in yourself and having confidence gives you outer strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Stay Strong, Make Them Wonder How You’re Still Smiling.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Can’t Stop Thinking About It, Don’t Stop Working For It.

author: Nicole Scherzinger
quote: Girl power is about loving yourself and having confidence and strength from within, so even if you're not wearing a sexy outfit, you feel sexy.

author: Virginia Satir
quote: Problems are not the problem; coping is the problem.

author: Charles Caleb Colton
quote: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength.

author: Tehmina Durrani
quote: I found an inner strength to fight for myself. It was clear that nobody else would.

author: Unknown
quote: Happiness Is Not A Destination It Is A Way Of Life.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Are Not Willing To Learn, No One Can Help You. If You Are Determined To Lean, No One Can Stop You.

author: Phil Jackson
quote: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Let Yourself Be Gutted. Let It Open You. Start There.

author: James Cash Penney
quote: The five separate fingers are five independent units. Close them and the fist multiplies strength. This is organization.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.

author: Unknown
quote: The Strongest People Are Not Those Who Show Strength In Front Of Us But Those Who Win Battles We Know Nothing About.

author: Huey Newton
quote: I have the people behind me and the people are my strength.

author: Lawrence G. Lovasik
quote: Strength of character means the ability to overcome resentment against others, to hide hurt feelings, and to forgive quickly.

author: Sanaa Lathan
quote: Being strong can be also feminine. I don’t think feminine equals being weak. Being strong is very sexy.

author: James Naismith
quote: Be strong in body, clean in mind, lofty in ideals.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Only one who devotes himself to a cause with his whole strength and soul can be a true master. For this reason mastery demands all of a person.

author: Max Lerner
quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.

author: William Ellery Channing
quote: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.

author: J. C. Watts
quote: It doesn’t take a lot of strength to hang on. It takes a lot of strength to let go.

author: Indira Gandhi
quote: A nation' s strength ultimately consists in what it can do on its own, and not in what it can borrow from others.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.

author: Sarah Dessen
quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that's what makes you strong.

author: Herodotus
quote: Force has no place where there is need of skill.

author: LeBron James
quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.

author: José N. Harris
quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.

author: Ingvar Kamprad
quote: We don't need flashy cars, impressive titles, uniforms, or other status symbols. We rely on our strength and our will!

author: Drew Barrymore
quote: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.

author: Hermann Hesse
quote: "Love must not entreat," she added, "or demand. Love must have the strength to become certain within itself. Then it ceases merely to be attracted and begins to attract."

author: Unknown
quote: You Have Within You, Right Now, Everything You Need To Deal With Whatever The World Can Throw At You.

author: Tilman J. Fertitta
quote: You’ve got to stay strong to be strong in tough times.

author: Unknown
quote: We All Have An Unsuspected Reserve Of Strength Inside That emerges When Life Puts Us To The Test.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Confession of errors is like a broom which sweeps away the dirt and leaves the surface brighter and clearer. I feel stronger for confession.

author: Rosa Parks
quote: God has always given me the strength to say what is right.

author: Eckhart Tolle
quote: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.

author: Indra Devi
quote: We must keep both our femininity and our strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Make A Fairy Tale And Go Live In It.

author: August Wilson
quote: Confront the dark parts of yourself, and work to banish them with illumination and forgiveness. Your willingness to wrestle with your demons will cause your angels to sing.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.

author: Lal Bahadur Shastri
quote: Discipline and united action are the real source of strength for the nation.

author: Hermann Hesse
quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.

author: Jane Austen
quote: I hate to hear you talk about all women as if they were fine ladies instead of rational creatures. None of us want to be in calm waters all our lives.

author: R.H. Sin
quote: Some women fear the fire some women simply become it.

author: Ann Landers
quote: Some people believe holding on and hanging in there are signs of great strength. However, there are times when it takes much more strength to know when to let go and then do it.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing Is Impossible, The World Itself Says “I’m Possible!”

author: Nicole Lyons
quote: I like dirty hearts and restless minds. The old souls that have known hard lives; the ones who cast the most beautiful shine.

author: Louis Pasteur
quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity.

author: Khloe Kardashian
quote: I’m strong and fearless and not afraid to take risks in business.

author: Unknown
quote: She Builds Others Up Because She Knows What It’s Like To Be Torn Down.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses. Focus on your character, not your reputation. Focus on your blessings, not your misfortunes.

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: If you were born with the weakness to fall. You were born with the strength to rise.

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
quote: Our real problem, then, is not our strength today; it is rather the vital necessity of action today to ensure our strength tomorrow.

author: Corrie Ten Boom
quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow. It empties today of its strength.

author: Bindi Irwin
quote: It's so easy to be there when it's all sunshine, but it really takes strength and courage to be there for each other during the dark times.

author: Billy Corgan
quote: Calm, open debate, and logical thought drive strength to its maximum effectiveness.

author: Blanka Vlasic
quote: Sometimes your disappointments make you a stronger person for the future.

author: Lilith Saintcrow
quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.

author: Jean de La Fontaine
quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.

author: John C. Mather
quote: There is strength in numbers, but organizing those numbers is one of the great challenges.

author: Unknown
quote: You can, and You Will.

author: Gloria Estefan
quote: My mom was a source of strength. She showed me by example that women, regardless of how difficult life may get, can do it all.

author: Samuel Smiles
quote: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.

author: Unknown
quote: True strength is keeping everything together when everyone expects you to fall apart.

author: James A. Froude
quote: You cannot dream yourself into a character; you must hammer and forge yourself one.

author: Ralph W. Sockman
quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness. Nothing is so gentle as real strength.

author: George W. Bush
quote: The financial crisis should not become an excuse to raise taxes, which would only undermine the economic growth required to regain our strength.

author: Aldis Hodge
quote: What is a superhero? They're supposed to represent hope, opportunity, and strength for everybody.

author: Unknown
quote: What Would You Do If You Weren’t Afraid?

author: Unknown
quote: Women Have Been Trained To Speak Softly And Carry A Lipstick. Those Days Are Over.

author: Unknown
quote: Stay Positive Even When It Feels Like Your Life Is Falling Apart.

author: Thomas Fuller
quote: It's skill, not strength, that governs a ship.

author: Mandy Ingber
quote: Yoga is equal parts strength, flexibility, balance, and endurance.

author: Unknown
quote: Go Ahead Tell Me That I’m Not Good Enough Tell Me I Can’T Do It Because I Will Show You Over & Over That I Can!

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.

author: Dalai Lama XIV
quote: There is a saying in Tibetan, 'Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.' No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster.

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: The world gives you so much pain and here you are making gold out of it there is nothing purer than that.

author: Douglas Coupland
quote: We are all of us born with a letter inside us, and that only if we are true to ourselves, may we be allowed to read it before we die.

author: Unknown
quote: A Strong Woman Is One Who Is Able To Smile This Morning Like She Wasn’t Crying Last Night.

author: Hudson Taylor
quote: If we are faithful to God in little things, we shall gain experience and strength that will be helpful to us in the more serious trials of life.

author: Walter Martin
quote: A key to strengthening spiritual muscles and enduring hardship is finding strength in the Word of God.

author: Richard L. Evans
quote: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Forget Your Past, Forgive Yourself, And Begin Again Right Now.

author: Woodrow Wilson
quote: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Let Anyone Ever Break Your Soul….

author: Anne Frank
quote: A quiet conscience makes one strong!

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: Religion is an illusion and it derives its strength from the fact that it falls in with our instinctual desires.

author: Atticus
quote: I’ve never met a strong person with an easy past.

author: Unknown
quote: It’s Okay To Be Scared. Being Scared Means You’re About To Do Something Really, Really Brave.

author: James Frey
quote: Be strong. Live honorably and with dignity. When you don’t think you can, hold on.

author: Allan Rufus
quote: Your inner strength is your outer foundation.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Once You Start To See Results, It Becomes An Addiction.

author: Peter Marshall
quote: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.

author: Unknown
quote: Above All, Be the Heroine Of Your Life, Not The Victim.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men.

author: Unknown
quote: I’ll Find Strength in Pain.

author: Victoria Addino
quote: Never believe for a second that your weak, within all of us we have a reserve of inner hidden strength.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Simulated disorder postulates perfect discipline; simulated fear postulates courage; simulated weakness postulates strength.

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires great strength to decide on what to do.

author: Ovid
quote: Courage conquers all things: it even gives strength to the body.

author: Georgette Mosbacher
quote: Feminine force is that inner strength, that power, that will to face down any negative circumstances in life and defeat them.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: Does anybody really think that they didn't get what they had because they didn't have the talent or the strength or the endurance or the commitment?

author: Dennis Prager
quote: People confuse goodness with weakness. It is weak people, not good people (goodness demands strength), who are taken advantage of.

author: Proverbs 31:25
quote: She is clothed with strength and dignity. She laughs without fear of the future.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.

author: Greg Rutherford
quote: Running up a steep hill or up steps are fantastic ways of building explosive strength.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.

author: Unknown
quote: Courage is looking fear right in the eye and saying: “Get the hell out of my way, I’ve got things to do.”

author: James Frey
quote: Be strong. Live honorably and with dignity. When you don't think you can, hold on.

author: Criss Jami
quote: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.

author: Auliq Ice
quote: Everything started as nothing.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes You Have To Get Knocked Down Lower Than You Have Ever Been To Stand Back Up Taller Than You Ever Were.

author: Baruch Spinoza
quote: Peace is not the absence of war, but a virtue based on strength of character.

author: Kimberly Elise
quote: Thankfully, I was given a strong base by my parents, an understanding of who I was and my strength.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

author: Melissa Etheridge
quote: Be strong, believe in who you are; be strong, believe in what you feel.

author: Unknown
quote: Storms Makes Tress Take Deeper Roots.

author: Unknown
quote: We All Have A Fighter In Us.

author: Jon Krakauer
quote: It’s not always necessary to be strong, but to feel strong.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.

author: Gemma Troy
quote: Whatever makes you feel the sun from the inside out chase that.

author: Calvin Coolidge
quote: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong.

author: Unknown
quote: Women are like teabags. We don't know our true strength until we are in hot water!

author: Unknown
quote: The Strongest Actions For A Woman Is To Love Herself, Be herself And Shine Amongst Those Who Never Believed She Could.

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: And here you are living despite it all.

author: Unknown
quote: Growth Is Painful. Change Is Painful. But Nothing Is As Painful As Staying Stuck Somewhere You Don’t Belong.

author: Veronica Roth
quote: A brave man acknowledges the strength of others.

author: Emilie Autumn
quote: It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for; I can never fight for myself, but, for others, I can kill.

author: The Dreamer
quote: In order to save myself, I must destroy first the me I was told to be.

author: Buddha
quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.

author: Penelope Cruz
quote: I have a strong personality, and I say what I think.

author: Ben Jonson
quote: He knows not his own strength that has not met adversity.

author: Gloria Allred
quote: There are some people who still feel threatened by strong women. That’s their problem. It’s not mine.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

author: James Dean
quote: Only the gentle are ever really strong.

author: Morgan Harper Nichols
quote: Tell the story of the mountain you climbed. Your words could be a page in someone else’s survival guide.

author: Janelle Monae
quote: I believe it's time that women truly owned their superpowers and used their beauty and strength to change the world around them.

author: Winona LaDuke
quote: What we all need to do is find the wellspring that keeps us going, that gives us the strength and patience to keep up this struggle for a long time.

author: Unknown
quote: I Am Strong Because I Know My Weaknesses. I Am Beautiful Because I Am Aware Of My Flaws. I AM Fearless…

author: Dag Hammarskjold
quote: Life only demands from you the strength that you possess. Only one feat is possible; not to run away.

author: Unknown
quote: And The Salt In My Wounds Isn’t Burning Anymore Than It Used To…

author: Evita Peron
quote: I know that, like every woman of the people, I have more strength than I appear to have.

author: Criss Jami
quote: If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: God, our Creator, has stored within our minds and personalities, great potential strength and ability. Prayer helps us tap and develop these powers.

author: T.F. Hodge
quote: The sky is not my limit…I am.

author: Emma Smith
quote: Strength is not something you have, it’s something you find.

author: Charles Spurgeon
quote: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.

author: Patrick Ness
quote: It's not that you should never love something so much that it can control you. It's that you need to love something that much so you can never be controlled. It's not a weakness. It's your best strength.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: He is greatest whose strength carries up the most hearts by the attraction of his own.

author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
quote: The moment we begin to fear the opinions of others and hesitate to tell the truth that is in us, and from motives of policy are silent when we should speak, the divine floods of light and life no longer flow into our souls.

author: S.R.W
quote: Oh, you have the tale twisted, I am not what you thought. You had me down as a damsel? Darling, I’m the wolf.

author: Queen Elizabeth II
quote: My husband has quite simply been my strength and stay all these years, and I owe him a debt greater than he would ever claim.

author: Marge Piercy
quote: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: It is unwise to be too sure of one's own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err.

author: Richard Bach
quote: Strong beliefs win strong men, and then make them stronger.

author: Audre Lorde
quote: If I didn't define myself for myself, I would be crunched into other people's fantasies for me and eaten alive.

author: Amos Bronson Alcott
quote: Strengthen me by sympathizing with my strength, not my weakness.

author: Alison Malee
quote: Be brave. The day is ready for you.

author: Unknown
quote: Nobody Is Too Busy, It’s Just A Matter Of Priorities.

author: Atticus
quote: “Put your head up,” he said. For you are a lion. Don’t forget that and neither will the sheep.

author: Louisa May Alcott
quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.

author: David Hume
quote: No man ever threw away life while it was worth keeping.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Joy is strength.

author: Susan Gale
quote: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.

author: Unknown
quote: Being Both Soft And Strong Is A Combination Very Few Have Mastered.

author: Jay Samit
quote: The strength of brand loyalty begins with how your product makes people feel.

author: Tom Perez
quote: I think our big tent is our greatest strength.

author: Dolly Parton
quote: Living in America and, of course, just being women in general, we've got more strength than we think we do.

author: Unknown
quote: Heavenly Father Knows All About You…

author: Unknown
quote: Believe In Yourself A Little More.

author: Rachel Carson
quote: Those who contemplate the beauty of the earth find reserves of strength that will endure as long as life lasts.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Life doesn’t get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.

author: Drew Barrymore
quote: In the end, some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths.

author: Dan Brown
quote: God, grant me strength to accept those things I cannot change.

author: Alison Malee
quote: Do not let your mind whisper fear into your heart. It will try. It will try.

author: Dusty Baker
quote: I’m a strong man, and usually I get over hurts and it makes me stronger when I come back.

author: Tommy Lee
quote: When you're playing upside down, it takes twice the strength.

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.

author: John Steinbeck
quote: And the little screaming fact that sounds through all history: repression works only to strengthen and knit the repressed.

author: Mignon McLaughlin
quote: Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense.

author: Ellen G. White
quote: The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in God.

author: Unknown
quote: Give God Your Weakness And He’ll Give You His Strength.

author: Louis XIV
quote: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says ‘I’m possible’!

author: Unknown
quote: Throw Me To The Wolves And I’ll Come Back Leading The Pack.

author: Anne Frank
quote: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person’s character lies in their own hands.

author: Tecumseh
quote: A single twig breaks, but the bundle of twigs is strong.

author: Friedrich Schiller
quote: The strong man is strongest when alone.

author: Reba McEntire
quote: Being a strong woman is very important to me. But doing it all on my own is not.

author: T. D. Jakes
quote: If you learn how to forgive others for not being strong, then people can learn how to forgive you for your own issues.

author: Milla Jovovich
quote: I am a strong Ukrainian girl, that is why I work a lot.

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: And here you are living despite of it all.

author: C. JoyBell C.
quote: Don't be afraid of your fears. They're not there to scare you. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.

author: Hal Borland
quote: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.

author: Unknown
quote: You’re Never Too Young To Dream BIG!

author: Nicole Polizzi
quote: Be sure of yourself, don’t let anyone bully you, be a strong and independent woman or boy.

author: G.K. Chesterton
quote: Moderate strength is shown in violence, supreme strength is shown in levity.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: Let fear be a counselor and not a jailer.

author: W. H. Auden
quote: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.

author: Nora Ephron
quote: Above all be the heroine of your life, not the victim.

author: Laurence Sterne
quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.

author: Connie Brockway
quote: Give me a strong back, over a soft heart.

author: Knute Rockne
quote: Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.

author: Unknown
quote: Go As Long As You Can, And Then Take Another Step.

author: Vincent van Gogh
quote: It is good to love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is well done.

author: George Orwell
quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.

author: Veronica Roth
quote: A brave man acknowledges the strength of others.

author: Emilia Clarke
quote: I think the reason why strong women have such a powerful impact is that you've got the strength of a man with the heart and sensitivity of a woman.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.

author: Benito Mussolini
quote: We become strong, I feel, when we have no friends upon whom to lean, or to look to for moral guidance.

author: Unknown
quote: Do You Want to Be Happy? Let Go Of What’s Gone, Be Grateful For What Remains And Look Forward To What Is Coming.

author: Hagrid
quote: What’s comin’ will come and we’ll meet it when it does.

author: The Better Man Project
quote: Brave girl, never settle again.

author: James Dean
quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever, live as if you’ll die today.

author: Billy Graham
quote: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.

author: Ludwig van Beethoven
quote: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.

author: William Wordsworth
quote: Though nothing can bring back the hour Of splendor in the grass, of glory in the flower; We will grieve not, rather find Strength in what remains behind; In the primal sympathy Which having been must ever be...

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: The kindest words my father said to me women like you drown oceans.

author: George W. Bush
quote: The wisest use of American strength is to advance freedom.

author: Joyce Brothers
quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.

author: Unknown
quote: The Strongest People Are Not Those Who Show Strength In Front Of Us But Those Who Win Battles WeKnow Nothing About.

author: Chinua Achebe
quote: When a tradition gathers enough strength to go on for centuries, you don't just turn it off one day.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Sure I am of this, that you have only to endure to conquer.

author: Gisele Bundchen
quote: When I’m weak, you can be strong; when I’m strong, you can be weak. That’s what I believe marriage is.

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: What is stronger than the human heart which shatters over and over and still lives.

author: Sena Jeter Naslund
quote: If you meet a woman of whatever complexion who sails her life with strength and grace and assurance, talk to her! And what you will find is that there has been a suffering, that at some time she has left herself for hanging dead.

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
quote: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.

author: Atticus
quote: That was her magic, she could still see the sunset, even on those darkest days.

author: Anthony J. D’Angelo
quote: Have a strong mind and a soft heart.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast.

author: Unknown
quote: Courage is looking fear right in the eye and saying, ‘Get the hell out of my way, I’ve got things to do.'

author: Cara Delevingne
quote: Victoria's Secret is really about celebrating women and what they stand for: the strength.

author: Cesar Chavez
quote: We draw our strength from the very despair in which we have been forced to live. We shall endure.

author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.

author: Tom Holland
quote: My biggest flaw is probably my attention span or lack thereof. And while it might seem contradictory, my biggest strength is my work ethic.

author: Frederick Douglass
quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.

author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson
quote: You don't have to be a bodybuilder to have strength in your muscles.

author: Unknown
quote: I Figure, If A Girl Wants To Be A Legend, She Should Go Ahead And Be One.

author: Ken Kesey
quote: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things.

author: Corrie ten Boom
quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing Can Dim The Light That Shines From Within.

author: Unknown
quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection.”

author: Gregory Peck
quote: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.

author: Unknown
quote: If You’re Lucky Enough To Be Different, Don’t Ever Change.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Quit. Suffer Now And Live The Rest Of Your Life As A Champion.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.

author: Unknown
quote: Wake Up With Determination. Go To Bed With Satisfaction.

author: Morgan Harper Nichols
quote: Going through things you never thought you’d go through will only take you places you never thought you’d get to.

author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
quote: We all have enough strength to endure the misfortunes of others.

author: Francis Bacon
quote: Fortitude is the marshal of thought, the armor of the will, and the fort of reason.

author: Bram Stoker
quote: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.

author: Max Lucado
quote: The key is this: Meet today’s problems with today’s strength.

author: Anaïs Nin
quote: I don’t really want to become normal, average, standard. I want merely to gain in strength, in the courage to live out my life more fully, enjoy more, experience more. I want to develop even more original and more unconventional traits

author: Unknown
quote: When You Start Seeing Your Worth, You’ll Find It Harder To Stay Around People Who Don’t.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: Everything’s possible if you’ve got enough nerve.

author: Marie Lu
quote: If you want to rebel, rebel from inside the system.That's much more powerful than rebelling outside the system.

author: Unknown
quote: The Struggle Of You’re In Today Is Developing the Strength You Need For Tomorrow.

author: Justin Trudeau
quote: I know and I've always felt for Canada that we recognize that diversity is a great source of strength.

author: John Burroughs
quote: The spirit of man can endure only so much and when it is broken only a miracle can mend it.

author: John Cheever
quote: Wisdom we know is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.

author: Unknown
quote: You Never Realize How Strong You Are Until Being Strong Is the Only Choice You Have.

author: Julie Graham
quote: I don’t know exactly what’s next but I’m stepping forward with grit, anchored in grace.

author: Dan Brown, Angels & Demons
quote: God, grant me strength to accept those things I cannot change.

author: Unknown
quote: Stop Wearing Your Wishbone Where Your Backbone Ought to Be.

author: Virgil
quote: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance.

author: Mandy Hale
quote: A strong woman accepts both compliments and criticism graciously, knowing that it takes both sunshine and rain for a flower to grow.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.

author: Albert Camus
quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.

author: John Muir
quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.

author: Ariana Dancu
quote: She made broken look beautiful and strong look invincible. She walked with the Universe on her shoulders and made it look like a pair of wings.

author: Unknown
quote: Do Not Jude You Don’T Know What Storm I’ve Asked Her To Walk Trough.

author: Gabrielle Giffords
quote: My spirit is as strong as ever. I’m still fighting to make the world a safer place, and you can, too.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes The Bad Things That Happen In Our Lives Put Us Directly On The Best Things That Will Ever Happen To Us.

author: Ruby Dee
quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within – strength, courage, dignity.

author: Unknown
quote: Step Into My Shoes And Walk the life I’m Living And If you Get As Far As I am, Just Maybe You Will See How Strong I Really Am.

author: John Ruskin
quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.

author: Unknown
quote: Life Has A Way Of Testing A Persons Will, Either By Having Nothing Happen At All or By Having Everything Happen At Once.

author: Carry Nation
quote: I felt invincible. My strength was that of a giant. God was certainly standing by me. I smashed five saloons with rocks before I ever took a hatchet.

author: Harriet Tubman
quote: I would fight for my liberty so long as my strength lasted, and if the time came for me to go, the Lord would let them take me.

author: Pat Riley
quote: There can only be one state of mind as you approach any profound test; total concentration, a spirit of togetherness, and strength.

author: Unknown
quote: A Strong Woman Looks A Challenge Dead In The Eye And Gives It a Wink.

author: Japanese Proverb
quote: Fall down seven times, get up eight.

author: Arthur Machen
quote: Silence is not weakness and decency is not pride.

author: Unknown
quote: Dear Stress, Let’s Break up.

author: Betty Friedan
quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.

author: Horace
quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.

author: Unknown
quote: A True Hero Isn’t Measured By The Size Of His Strength, But By The Strength Of His Heart

author: Selena Gomez
quote: My strength is translating emotion because I'm such a feeler.

author: Mary Wollstonecraft
quote: My own sex, I hope, will excuse me, if I treat them like rational creatures, instead of flattering their graces, and viewing them as if they were in a state of perpetual childhood, unable to stand alone.

author: Peter Drucker
quote: My greatest strength as a consultant is to be ignorant and ask a few questions.

author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
quote: My strength is as the strength of ten, because my heart is pure.

author: Xan Oku
quote: May the flowers remind us why the rain was so necessary.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes You Face Difficulties You’re Doing Something Wrong, But Because You’re Doing Something Right.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Tell People Your Dream. Show Them.

author: Unknown
quote: A Strong Woman Stands Up For Herself. A Stronger Woman Stands Up For Everyone Else.

author: Cassandra Clare
quote: Temper us in fire, and we grow stronger. When we suffer, we survive.

author: Donald Trump
quote: We need a president with tremendous intelligence, smarts, cunning, strength and stamina.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: We gain the strength of the temptation we resist.

author: Thomas Paine
quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance.

author: T. D. Jakes
quote: We think that forgiveness is weakness, but it’s absolutely not; it takes a very strong person to forgive.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes, You Have To Get Knocked Down Lower Than You Have Ever Been To Stand Back Up Taller Than You Ever You Were.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.

author: Confucius
quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: As we advance in life it becomes more and more difficult, but in fighting the difficulties the inmost strength of the heart is developed.

author: Swami Vivekananda
quote: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.

author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide
quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Character, in the long run, is the decisive factor in the life of an individual and of nations alike.

author: William Samuel Johnson
quote: He knows not his own strength who hath not met adversity.

author: Unknown
quote: The Secret Of Having It All Is Believing You Already Do.

author: Unknown
quote: The Only Person You Should Try To Be Better Than, Is The Person You Were Yesterday.

author: Unknown
quote: I’ve Never Met A Strong Person With An Easy Part.

author: Joe Kelly
quote: We’re stronger than we think.

author: Jane Austen
quote: There is a stubbornness about me that never can bear to be frightened at the will of others. My courage always rises at every attempt to intimidate me.

author: Frida Kahlo
quote: At the end of the day, we can endure much more than we think we can.

author: Paula Radcliffe
quote: You can be strong and true to yourself without being rude or loud.’

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Let How You Feel Make You Forget What You Deserve.

author: A. A. Milne
quote: Promise me you’ll always remember: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You will find that they haven't half the strength you think they have.

author: William Barclay
quote: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.

author: Thomas Hardy
quote: A strong woman who recklessly throws away her strength, she is worse than a weak woman who has never had any strength to throw away.

author: Arnold Palmer
quote: Success in golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character.

author: Linda Poindexter
quote: One small crack doesn’t mean you are broken, it means that you were put to the test and you didn’t fall apart.

author: George Michael
quote: It takes so much strength to say to your ego, 'You know what? You're going to keep me lonely, so I have to ignore you.'

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.

author: Unknown
quote: She Is Clothed With Strength & Dignity And Laughs Without Fear Of The feature.

author: Booker T. Washington
quote: There are two ways of exerting one's strength: one is pushing down, the other is pulling up.

author: LL Cool J
quote: When adversity strikes, that’s when you have to be the most calm. Take a step back, stay strong, stay grounded and press on.

author: Hercules
quote: A true hero isn’t measured by the size of his strength, but by the strength of his heart.

author: Julie Gonzalo
quote: I consider myself to be a very strong, independent woman.

author: Unknown
quote: Maybe Life Isn’t About Avoiding The Bruises. Maybe It’s About Collecting The Scars To Prove We Showed Up For It.

author: Barbara Kingsolver
quote: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.

author: Mike Tyson
quote: As long as we persevere and endure, we can get anything we want.

author: Judith Viorst
quote: Strength is the capacity to break a Hershey bar into four pieces with your bare hands – and then eat just one of the pieces.

author: Narendra Modi
quote: Social media is reducing social barriers. It connects people on the strength of human values, not identities.

author: Unknown
quote: When You Change The Way You Look At Things, The Things You Look At Change.

author: Robert Kiyosaki
quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.

author: Frederic Chopin
quote: As long as I have health and strength, I will gladly work all my days.

author: Trent Shelton
quote: Never be ashamed about being broken, because strength is nothing but pain that’s been repaired.

author: William Makepeace Thackeray
quote: Follow your honest convictions and be strong.

author: Jenny Trout
quote: Strength isn’t about bearing a cross of grief or shame. Strength comes from choosing your own path, and living with the consequences.

author: George Henry Lewes
quote: Insincerity is always weakness; sincerity even in error is strength.

author: Cayla Mills
quote: You never know how strong you are… until being strong is the only choice you have.

author: Unknown
quote: When Start Seeing Your Worth, Your’ll Find It Harder To Stay Around People Who Don’t.

author: Unknown
quote: I’m Too Busy Working On My Own Grass To Notice If Yours Is Greener.

author: Mark Shields
quote: There is always strength in numbers. The more individuals or organizations that you can rally to your cause, the better.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: The world breaks every one and afterward many are strong at the broken places.

author: Unknown
quote: You’re Allowed To Scream, You’re Allowed To Cry, But Do Not Give Up.

author: Marie Osmond
quote: Women are so strong and knowledgeable. You know, instead of competing with each other, I would love to complete each other.

author: John Locke
quote: Fortitude is the guard and support of the other virtues.

author: Criss Jami
quote: Grudges are for those who insist that they are owed something; forgiveness, however, is for those who are substantial enough to move on.

author: Charles Spurgeon
quote: Think not that humility is weakness; it shall supply the marrow of strength to thy bones. Stoop and conquer; bow thyself and become invincible.

author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
quote: The measure of a man’s real character is what he would do if he knew he would never be found out.

author: Ronald Reagan
quote: Let us be shy no longer. Let us go to our strength. Let us offer hope. Let us tell the world that a new age is not only possible but probable.

author: Mariah Carey
quote: When you feel like hope is gone, look inside you and be strong and you’ll finally see the truth- that hero lies in you.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: The men who learn endurance, are they who call the whole world, brother.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Ever Mistake My Silence For Ignorance, My Calmness For Acceptance And My Kindness For Weakness.

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
quote: Believe in a love that is being stored up for you like an inheritance, and have faith that in this love there is a strength and a blessing so large that you can travel as far as you wish without having to step outside it.

author: Sade Adu
quote: To be a mother you must be strong. Even if you don’t feel it, you have to pretend.

author: Unknown
quote: A Strong Woman Loves, Forgives, Walks Aways, Lets Go, Tries again, and Perseveres…

author: Van Gogh
quote: Normality is a paved road. It’s comfortable to walk on but no flowers grow on it.

author: Atticus
quote: She wasn’t looking for a knight, she was looking for a sword.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Let The Behavior Of Others Destroy Inner Peace.

author: Unknown
quote: You Are Stronger Than You Think.

author: Blaise Pascal
quote: The strength of a man's virtue should not be measured by his special exertions, but by his habitual acts.

author: Steven Cojocaru
quote: Thank you to all for your prayers and good wishes. It gave me the strength to persevere and warmed my heart.

author: Birgitte Hjort Sorensen
quote: Don't worry about not fitting in. The things that make people think you're weird are what makes you you, and therefore your greatest strength.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.

author: Frederick Douglass
quote: The soul that is within me no man can degrade.

author: Garrett Fort
quote: The strength of the vampire is that people will not believe in him.

author: Unknown
quote: You’ve Always Had The Power My Dear, Your Just Had To Learn It For Yourself.

author: George F. Kennan
quote: Heroism is endurance for one moment more.

author: Unknown
quote: Smile And Let Everyone Know That Today, You’re A Lot Stronger Than You Were.

author: Al Carraway
quote: You really are good enough, pretty enough, and strong enough.

author: Louise Berliawsky Nevelson
quote: True strength is delicate.

author: Unknown
quote: I Am Strong Because I’ve Been Weak. I Am Fearless Because I’ve Been Afraid.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Nature is as well adapted to our weakness as to our strength.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: When your desires are strong enough you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.

author: Unknown
quote: True strength is keeping everything together when everyone expects you to fall apart.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

author: Kareena Kapoor Khan
quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: We’re stronger in the places that we’ve been broken.

author: David A. Bednar
quote: In the strength of the Lord we can do and endure and overcome all things.

author: Unknown
quote: Littles Girs With Dreams Becomes Women With Vision.

author: Unknown
quote: The Woman Who Does Not Required Validation From Anyone Is The Most Feared Individual On The Planet.

author: Katharine McPhee
quote: It feels good to be strong.

author: Lilith Saintcrow, Strange Angels
quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.

author: Angelina Jolie
quote: Our diversity is our strength. What a dull and pointless life it would be if everyone was the same.

author: Vernon Howard
quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing Is More Impressive Than A person Who Is Secure In The Unique Way God Made Her.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering oneself makes you fearless.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: Don’t pray for an easy life. Pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.

author: Harsha Bhogle
quote: Sometimes your greatest strength can emerge as a weakness if the context changes.

author: Thomas Merton
quote: Perhaps I am stronger than I think.

author: Unknown
quote: Some People Don’t Like You Just Because Your Strength Reminds Them Of Their Weakness. Don’t let The Hate Slow You Down.

author: Mike Murdock
quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.

author: Rikki Rogers
quote: Strength doesn’t come from what you do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.

author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton
quote: Power is so characteristically calm, that calmness in itself has the aspect of strength.

author: Thalia
quote: I’m a very strong woman.

author: Unknown
quote: Better Things Are Coming.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: Greatness lies not in being strong, but in the right use of strength.

author: Mary Elizabeth Winstead
quote: You don’t have to play masculine to be a strong woman.

author: Unknown
quote: You Were Given This Life Because You Are Strong Enough To Live It.

author: Henry Rollins
quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.

author: J. R. R. Tolkien
quote: You have been chosen, and you must therefore use such strength and heart and wits as you have.

author: Layne Staley
quote: My bad habits aren’t my title. My strengths and my talent are my title.

author: Euripides
quote: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity.

author: Unknown
quote: You Have To Be At Your Strongest When You’re feeling At Your Weakest.

author: Unknown
quote: You Can Become Strong And Powerful And Beautiful.

author: LL Cool J
quote: When adversity strikes, that's when you have to be the most calm. Take a step back, stay strong, stay grounded and press on.

author: Phillips Brooks
quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men!

author: Unknown
quote: A heart is a muscle..and what do muscles do when they are torn? They grow back STRONGER!

author: Bethenny Frankel
quote: Let’s be clear, I’m a strong woman.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Being deeply loved gives you strength; loving deeply gives you courage.

author: Unknown
quote: Hope Is The Only Thing Stronger Than Fear.

author: Robert E. Lee
quote: In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength.

author: Ho Chi Minh
quote: Remember, the storm is a good opportunity for the pine and the cypress to show their strength and their stability.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.

author: Tony Dungy
quote: I don't have the strength or wisdom to get through a single day without guidance and grace from God.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: I was not born to be forced. I will breathe after my own fashion. Let us see who is the strongest.

author: Unknown
quote: You Only Live Once, You Might As Well As A Badass!

author: George Sand
quote: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Haven’t Found It Yet, Keep Looking.

author: Patti Davis
quote: It takes strength to make your way through grief, to grab hold of life and let it pull you forward.

author: Trudie Styler
quote: Pilates has been the perfect solution to maintaining strength and vitality in my life.

author: Napoléon Bonaparte
quote: Courage isn’t having the strength to go on – it is going on when you don’t have strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Be That Strong Girl That Everyone Knew Would Make It Through The Worst. Be that Fearless Girl..

author: Rumi
quote: There is an invisible strength within us; when it recognizes two opposing objects of desire, it grows stronger.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities; strong men make them.

author: Henry Miller
quote: True strength lies in submission which permits one to dedicate his life, through devotion, to something beyond himself.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Too often the strong, silent man is silent only because he does not know what to say, and is reputed strong only because he has remained silent.

author: Elvis Stojko
quote: I had the strength and the finesse there and put it all together.

author: Emil Dorian
quote: Strong people alone know how to organize their suffering so as to bear only the most necessary pain.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.

author: J. C. Watts
quote: It doesn't take a lot of strength to hang on. It takes a lot of strength to let go.

author: Unknown
quote: You Attract What You Are, Not What You Want If You Want Great, Then Be Great.

author: Mike Norton
quote: Fall. Stand. Learn. Adapt.

author: Marcel Proust
quote: A powerful idea communicates some of its strength to him who challenges it.

author: Gisele Bundchen
quote: Having the strength to tune out negativity and remain focused on what I want gives me the will and confidence to achieve my goals.

author: Unknown
quote: I Am The Type Of Person That Will Sit In The Bathroom And Cry, But Then Walk Out Like Nothing Ever Happened.

author: Michael J. Fox
quote: One's dignity may be assaulted, vandalized and cruelly mocked, but it can never be taken away unless it is surrendered.

author: Unknown
quote: Forget All The Reasons Why It Wont Work And Believe The One Reason Why It Will!

author: Saint Francis de Sales
quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.

author: Ovid
quote: Suppressed grief suffocates, it rages within the breast, and is forced to multiply its strength.

author: Martha McSally
quote: Before I became a fighter pilot, everyone said that women didn't have the physical strength. Well, I had just completed the Hawaii Ironman Triathlon.

author: Benjamin Banneker
quote: The colour of the skin is in no way connected with strength of the mind or intellectual powers.

author: Xenophanes
quote: Better than the strength of men and horses is our wisdom.

author: Russell Brand
quote: Strength does not have to be belligerent and loud.

author: Rupi Kaur
quote: i am water soft enough to offer life tough enough to drown it away

author: Misty Copeland
quote: Be strong, be fearless, be beautiful. And believe that anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.

author: Buddha
quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty… otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.

author: Unknown
quote: Do What You Have To Do Until You Can Do What You Want To Do.

author: Regina King
quote: My mother was a single mom, and most of the women I know are strong.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.

author: Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation.

author: Unknown
quote: You Were Never Created To Live Depressed, Defeated, Guilty, Condemned, Ashamed Or Unworthy. You Were Created To Be Victorious.

author: Paul Harris
quote: The very strength of a nation eventually proves to be its weakness.

author: Ani DiFranco
quote: I know there is strength in the differences between us. I know there is comfort where we overlap.

author: Josephine Baker
quote: I believe in prayer. It's the best way we have to draw strength from heaven.

author: Carson Kressley
quote: It's really important to share the idea that being different might feel like a problem at the time, but ultimately diversity is a strength.

author: Unknown
quote: The Lord Is My Strength And My Shield In Him My Heart.

author: Unknown
quote: The Distance Between Your Dreams And Reality Is Call Action.

author: Unknown
quote: Hey Little Fighter, Soon Things Will Be Brighter.

author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
quote: Life asks not merely what you can do; it asks how much can you endure and not be spoiled.

author: Unknown
quote: Keep The Faith. The Most Amazing Things In Life Tend To Happen Right At The Moment You’re About To Give Up Hope.

author: Audre Lorde
quote: When I use my strength in the service of my vision it makes no difference whether or not I am afraid.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.

author: Aime Cesaire
quote: It is no use painting the foot of the tree white, the strength of the bark cries out from beneath the paint.

author: Anna Freud
quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence but it comes from within. It is there all the time.

author: E. Corona
quote: She has been through hell. So believe me when I say, fear her when she looks into a fire and smiles.

author: Unknown
quote: Smile And Let Everyone Know That Today, You’re A Lot Stronger Than You Were Yesterday.

author: Anais Nin
quote: Life is truly known only to those who suffer, lose, endure adversity and stumble from defeat to defeat.

author: Unknown
quote: It’s Better To Break Your Own Heart By Leaving, Rather Than Having That Person Break Your Heart Every Day You’re With Them.

author: Unknown
quote: Do Not Pray For An Easy Life, Pray For The Strength To Endure A Difficult One.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: A nation that destroys its soils destroys itself. Forests are the lungs of our land, purifying the air and giving fresh strength to our people.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

author: Unknown
quote: Character. Intelligence. Strength. Style. That Makes Beauty.

author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
quote: To be loved is a strength. To love is a weakness.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.

author: Shawn Johnson
quote: Stay strong. Stand up. Have a voice.

author: Bob Marley
quote: Don't give up the fight, Stand up for your rights.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: Talents are best nurtured in solitude, but character is best formed in the stormy billows of the world.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: When restraint and courtesy are added to strength, the latter becomes irresistible.

author: Unknown
quote: Strong Women Wear Their Pain Like They Do Stilettos. No Matter How Much It Hurts, All You See Is The Beauty Of It.

author: Tokugawa Ieyasu
quote: The strong manly ones in life are those who understand the meaning of the word patience.

author: Stephanie Bennett Henry
quote: Life is tough, my darling, but so are you.

author: Sara Blakely
quote: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know. That can be your greatest strength and ensure that you do things differently from everyone else.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: Have you not learned that strength comes to an ordinary soul when given an extraordinary calling?
